title: The Evening Tide
description: Asharal wants to rule, he seeks the Sunchair and will bloody his blade upon anyone who stands in his way.The Sun Elves yearn for the fulfillment of an ancient prophecy that has foretold their rise amidst moon and stars. Among them, there is one who will wait no longer for such a prophecy to come to pass. Asharal seeks to dethrone the ruling family, the Winds, who have just done the impossible: they have discovered immortality.**This book contains references to many historical atrocities that some may find triggering**
author: Jeremy Forsyth
